script.greeting: Hello, this is {{company_name}} calling about an overdue invoice. Are you {{customer_name}}?
script.handle_yes: Great! I'm calling to remind you about invoice {{invoice_number}} due on {{due_date}}. Can you help us process this today?
script.handle_no: May I ask who I'm speaking with, and would you be able to help me reach {{customer_name}}?
script.handle_busy: I understand you're busy. Would you like me to call back at a better time?
script.handle_angry: I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience. I'll have someone from our team reach out to you shortly.
script.fallback: Thank you for your time. Have a great day!

script.greeting: Hello {{customer_name}}, this is {{company_name}} confirming your appointment tomorrow at {{appointment_time}}.
script.handle_confirmed: Perfect! We'll see you then. Thank you!
script.handle_reschedule: I understand. Let me note that you need to reschedule. Someone will call you back to finalize new details.
script.fallback: Thank you. We look forward to seeing you soon.
